duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent customer service and analysis related to the Kronos system.
Review business processes related to Finance Training & Support and identify improvements.
Plan, produce, and administer training programs within the Finance Division of NYU Langone Health.
Identify problematic areas of business processes and provide alternatives and recommendations for changes.
Assess training program effectiveness and ensure continuous improvement of training materials.
Respect and maintain confidentiality of all information within NYULH.
Log all inbound phone calls and correspondence to Salesforce for proper handling and resolution.
Resolve all customer issues in a professional, qualitative, and responsive manner.
Analyze, research, and resolve inquiries related to Kronos.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree plus 2 years of experience in timekeeping and/or payroll, or equivalent combination of education and experience.
